title: PBE Darius buffs removed?
body:
Since I don't have a PBE account can anybody tell me if they scrapped the Darius ult buffs on the pbe for 5.6?
The site I've been getting my info from has put a black line through all his changes so I can assume so but I wanna be sure.

replies.body: What's wrong with darius now? How did he get a buff? IIRC, only when he gets third level ult does his ult even reset now.

After reading the notes, I loled. It still works as normal, but a COMPLETE RESET and mana reduction? Yeah okay wow. Still, he's not that bad even with that buff, at most he does a bit more damage, still gets shat on by teemo top.
Try surrender@20 they have the most up to date pbe patch notes if it has a black line through it it usually means its been scrapped
